Reference

Workflow Methods

cadra_search()

CaDrA Search

candidate_search()

Candidate Search

topn_eval()

Evaluate Top 'N' Best Features

topn_best()

Top 'N' best

ks_gene_score_mat()

Kolmogorov-Smirnov Scoring Method

wilcox_genescore_mat()

Wilcoxon Rank Sum Scoring Method

revealer_genescore_mat()

REVEALER Scoring Method

custom_genescore_mat()

Customized Scoring Method

ks_gene_score()

Compute a Kolmogorov-Smirnov score for a given ranked list

wilcox_genescore()

Compute rank sum scores for a given binary feature

revealer_genescore()

Compute Conditional Mutual Information of x and y given z from REVEALER

generate_permutations()

Random permutation matrix generator

prefilter_data()

Pre-filter features

kde2d_wrap()

kde2d_wrap_ wrapper

ks_genescore_mat()

Compute KS scores for each row of a given matrix

ks_genescore_wrap()

ks.genescore wrapper

ks_test_double_wrap()

ks_test_d_wrap_ wrapper

Plot Methods

meta_plot()

Candidate heuristic search plot

topn_plot()

Top 'N' Plot

permutation_plot()

Permutation Best Scores Plot

plot_ESet()

Enrichment Score (ES) plot

ks_plot_wrap()

ks_plot wrapper

Data Objects

sim.ES

Simulated binary genomic data

topn.list

Top-N result list for simulated binary genomic data

perm.res

Permutation Results

CCLE_MUT_SCNA

Binary Genomic Data

CTNBB1_reporter

A Continuous Measures of a Targeted Profile
